\begin{schema}{StateA}
xA: \nat
\where
xA = 1
\end{schema}

\begin{schema}{StateB}
xB: \nat
\where
xB = 2
\end{schema}

\begin{schema}{A}
\Delta StateA
\end{schema}

\begin{schema}{B}
\Delta StateB
\where 
xB = 3
\end{schema}

\begin{schema}{D}
xD: \nat \\
xD': \nat
\where 
xD = 4
\end{schema}

\begin{zed}
C == A \lor B \\
E == C \lor D
\end{zed}
